user.title: Set up UniFi Protect 2-Way Audio
user.description: This integration adds 2-way audio support to UniFi Protect cameras. It requires the UniFi Protect integration to be already configured.

abort.already_configured: UniFi Protect 2-Way Audio is already configured

init.title: UniFi Protect 2-Way Audio Options
init.description: Configure options for UniFi Protect 2-Way Audio

start_talkback.name: Start Talkback
start_talkback.description: Start 2-way audio talkback to a UniFi Protect camera

stop_talkback.name: Stop Talkback
stop_talkback.description: Stop 2-way audio talkback to a UniFi Protect camera

toggle_mute.name: Toggle Mute
toggle_mute.description: Toggle microphone mute state for 2-way audio
